title: Girls In Love
description: Meet Ellie and her best friends Nadine and Magda, three teenage girls just starting Year Nine with a lot on their minds â€“ mainly boys! Told in the bright, sparky and authentic voice of Ellie, Girls in Love is a funny, frank and revealing look at their friendships, problems and heartaches that older fans of bestselling author Jacqueline Wilson will adore.Books in the series:1. Girls in Love2. Girls Under Pressure3. Girls Out Late4. Girls in Tears
author: Jacqueline Wilson
